attributes.action: pass a law allowing women who are having an abortion to donate their embryo towards stem cell research.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: a lot of money is spent on this research however if this motion was to be carried it would save a lot of money. also if stem cell therapy was allowed we would have a sufficient source of stem cells. this source could lead to many cures and treatments to illnesses which aren't able to be treated this present day.
